category: Click Boards > Display & LED > LED segment
name: mikroe.click.ledflash3
short_description: LED Flash 3 Click is a compact add-on board representing a powerful flash/torch solution. This board features the KTD2691, an inductor-less, single-flash LED driver from Kinetic Technologies. It includes one current source that can drive up to 1.5A of LED flash current or up to 376mA of torch current.
